type:

            Filter.atTop).toReal.toEReal →

              2) →
          instPartialOrderEReal.lt
              (Filter.limsup (fun n => (instHPow.hPow (abs (s.seq n)) (instHDiv.hDiv 1 n.cast)).toEReal) Filter.atTop)
              (instHAdd.hAdd

                      (Filter.limsup (fun n => (instHPow.hPow (abs (s.seq n)) (instHDiv.hDiv 1 n.cast)).toEReal)
                          Filter.atTop).toReal)
                    2)).toEReal →
            Real.instLT.lt
                (instHAdd.hAdd
                  (Filter.limsup (fun n => (instHPow.hPow (abs (s.seq n)) (instHDiv.hDiv 1 n.cast)).toEReal)
                      Filter.atTop).toReal
                  (instHDiv.hDiv
                    (instHSub.hSub 1
                      (Filter.limsup (fun n => (instHPow.hPow (abs (s.seq n)) (instHDiv.hDiv 1 n.cast)).toEReal)
                          Filter.atTop).toReal)
                    2))
                1 →
              Real.instLT.lt 0
                  (instHAdd.hAdd
                    (Filter.limsup (fun n => (instHPow.hPow (abs (s.seq n)) (instHDiv.hDiv 1 n.cast)).toEReal)
                        Filter.atTop).toReal
                    (instHDiv.hDiv
                      (instHSub.hSub 1
                        (Filter.limsup (fun n => (instHPow.hPow (abs (s.seq n)) (instHDiv.hDiv 1 n.cast)).toEReal)
                            Filter.atTop).toReal)
                      2)) →
                ∀ (N' : Int),

                      GE.ge b N' →
                        CompleteLinearOrder.toConditionallyCompleteLinearOrderBot.toSemilatticeInf.lt
                          (instHPow.hPow (abs (s.seq b)) (instHDiv.hDiv 1 b.cast)).toEReal
                          (instHAdd.hAdd
                              (Filter.limsup (fun n => (instHPow.hPow (abs (s.seq n)) (instHDiv.hDiv 1 n.cast)).toEReal)
                                  Filter.atTop).toReal
                              (instHDiv.hDiv
                                (instHSub.hSub 1
                                  (Filter.limsup
                                      (fun n => (instHPow.hPow (abs (s.seq n)) (instHDiv.hDiv 1 n.cast)).toEReal)
                                      Filter.atTop).toReal)
                                2)).toEReal) →
                    (∀ (n : Int),
                        GE.ge n (Int.instMax.max N' (Int.instMax.max s.m 1)) →
                          Real.instLE.le (abs (s.seq n))
                            (instHPow.hPow
                              (instHAdd.hAdd
                                (Filter.limsup
                                    (fun n => (instHPow.hPow (abs (s.seq n)) (instHDiv.hDiv 1 n.cast)).toEReal)
                                    Filter.atTop).toReal

                                  2))

                          (instHAdd.hAdd s.m
                            (instHSub.hSub (Int.instMax.max N' (Int.instMax.max s.m 1)) s.m).toNat.cast) →
                        ({ m := 0,
                                  seq := fun n =>

                                            (instHAdd.hAdd
                                              (Filter.limsup
                                                  (fun n =>
                                                    (instHPow.hPow (abs (s.seq n)) (instHDiv.hDiv 1 n.cast)).toEReal)

                                                      (fun n =>

                                                            (instHDiv.hDiv 1 n.cast)).toEReal)
                                                      Filter.atTop).toReal)
                                                2))

                                              (instHAdd.hAdd
                                                (Filter.limsup
                                                    (fun n =>
                                                      (instHPow.hPow (abs (s.seq n)) (instHDiv.hDiv 1 n.cast)).toEReal)
                                                    Filter.atTop).toReal
                                                (instHDiv.hDiv
                                                  (instHSub.hSub 1
                                                    (Filter.limsup
                                                        (fun n =>
                                                          (instHPow.hPow (abs (s.seq n))
                                                              (instHDiv.hDiv 1 n.cast)).toEReal)
                                                        Filter.atTop).toReal)
                                                  2))
                                              n)
                                          n.toNat)
                                        0,
                                    vanish := ⋯ }.m
                                (Int.instMax.max N' (Int.instMax.max s.m 1)).toNat.cast)).converges →
                          (s.from (Int.instMax.max N' (Int.instMax.max s.m 1))).abs.converges →

                                        (instHSub.hSub (Int.instMax.max N' (Int.instMax.max s.m 1)) s.m).toNat.cast)

type:
∀ {c : Int → Real} (m : Int),
  (∀ (n : Int), GE.ge n m → GT.gt (c n) 0) →
    Not
        (Eq (Filter.limsup (fun n => (instHDiv.hDiv (c (instHAdd.hAdd n 1)) (c n)).toEReal) Filter.atTop)
          EReal.instTop.top) →
      instPartialOrderEReal.le 0
          (Filter.limsup (fun n => (instHDiv.hDiv (c (instHAdd.hAdd n 1)) (c n)).toEReal) Filter.atTop) →
        Ne (Filter.limsup (fun n => (instHDiv.hDiv (c (instHAdd.hAdd n 1)) (c n)).toEReal) Filter.atTop)
            instBotEReal.bot →
          Eq (Filter.limsup (fun n => (instHDiv.hDiv (c (instHAdd.hAdd n 1)) (c n)).toEReal) Filter.atTop)
              (Filter.limsup (fun n => (instHDiv.hDiv (c (instHAdd.hAdd n 1)) (c n)).toEReal)
                    Filter.atTop).toReal.toEReal →
            Real.instLE.le 0
                (Filter.limsup (fun n => (instHDiv.hDiv (c (instHAdd.hAdd n 1)) (c n)).toEReal) Filter.atTop).toReal →
              ∀ (y : EReal),
                Real.instLT.lt
                    (Filter.limsup (fun n => (instHDiv.hDiv (c (instHAdd.hAdd n 1)) (c n)).toEReal) Filter.atTop).toReal
                    y.toReal →
                  Not (Eq y EReal.instTop.top) →
                    Eq y y.toReal.toEReal →
                      Real.instLT.lt 0
                        (instHSub.hSub y.toReal
                          (Filter.limsup (fun n => (instHDiv.hDiv (c (instHAdd.hAdd n 1)) (c n)).toEReal)
                              Filter.atTop).toReal)
